descriptor.name: nStore
descriptor.short_desc: Engagement platform between stores and consumers
descriptor.long_desc: Engagement platform between stores and consumers

descriptor.name: Basspods P11 (TWS)
descriptor.long_desc:
1) True Wireless Stereo Earbuds: Flat sensor Touch control earbuds with precise controls
2) Seamless Connectivity: Bluetooth v5.1 with 1-step pairing, auto-reconnect, wide compatibility & 10 meters wireless range
3) Dynamic Drivers: Natural stereo sound with deep bass | 10mm Drivers | 32 ohms impedance
4) Noise Cancellation: In-ear vacuum sealed design ensures passive noise cancellation
5) Built-in Mic: Dual HD mic | Stereo calls | Mono & stereo capability
6) All day Long Music Playback: 24 hours of total playtime with the charging case
7) Batteries: 40mAh*2 earbuds & 250mAh Digital display charging case with Type-C fast charging
8) Integrated Controls: Music, calls & awaking phone’s voice assistant

descriptor.name: Basspods P251+ with ENC (Black)
descriptor.long_desc:
Equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.1, which enjoys faster pairing, more stable connection, and signal transmission. ENC for Call Noise Reduction: Environment Noise Cancellation technology ensures you are heard loud and clear on phone calls. Ergonomic & Lightweight Design: An ergonomic design ensures all-day comfort. Whether you are going to work or the gym, no need to remove these wireless headphones. A single earbud weighs only 4gms, making it as light as a feather and discreet in the ear. Lag-free Entertainment: Dedicated movie & music mode lets you enjoy audio and video with minimum lag. Immersive Stereo Sound: Basspods P81 Pro earbuds’12mm diameter speaker presents a powerful and wide sound range, which makes the treble full of dynamics, and the bass powerful. Long Battery Life: With these Bluetooth headphones' 40mAh capacity and charging case 500mAh capacity, you can enjoy music for 50 hours non-stop at 50% music volume. Smart touch control: pTron Basspods P81 Pro earbuds support dual-ear touch control, providing convenient operation on previous/next song, pause and answer calls along as well as voice assistant control. Easy to Carry Case: With its Small size, Basspods P81 Pro is more suitable for carrying, outdoor sports, cycling, and so on, and more convenient to carry. Let you enjoy music anytime, and anywhere. 
 1) Bluetooth 5.1 with 10m Wireless Range & Quick Pairing 
2) 50Hrs Playback Time with Case | Type-C Charging Port 
3) 12mm Drivers Ensure Immersive Stereo Audio with Deep Bass 
4) ENC Technology & Built-in Mic for Clear Stereo Calls 
5) Movie & Music Mode for Lag-free Entertainment 
6) Snug-fit Touch Control Earbuds with Passive Noise Cancellation, Voice Assistance & IPX4

descriptor.name: Basspods B11 TWS
descriptor.long_desc:
1) Ergonomic & Feather-lite TWS Earbuds with Immersive Stereo Sound & Deep Bass | 13mm Drivers 
2) Bluetooth 5.1 with 10m Wireless Range, 1-Step Pairing, Auto-reconnect & Wide Compatibility 
3) Dual HD Mic for Stereo Calls & Stereo/Mono Bud Capability 
4) Total 28Hrs Playback Time with Case | Compact Charging Case with Type-C Fast Charging Port 
5) Flat Touch Sensors for Precise Controls | Music, Calls & Voice Assistant 
6) Secure-fit Wireless Earphones with Passive Noise Cancellation & IPX4 Water/Sweat-Resistance

descriptor.name: Basspods P481 TWS Earbuds (Black)
descriptor.long_desc:
1) Snug-Fit & Ultra-lite TWS Earbuds with Immersive Audio with Deep Bass | 10mm Dynamic Drivers 
2) Low Latency Sync | Bluetooth 5.3 with 10m Wireless Range, 1-Step Pairing, Auto-reconnect & Wide Compatibility 
3) Total 60Hrs Playback Time with Case on a Single Full Charge | Compact 400mAh Charging Case with Type-C Fast Charging Port 
4) Dual HD MEMS Mic for Clear Stereo Call & tereo/Mono Bud Capability | ENC Technology for More Voice Less Noise Voice Calls - Be Heard Loud & Clear 5) Touch Sensors for Easy Controls | Music, Calls & Voice Assistance 6) Secure-fit Wireless Earphones with Passive Noise Cancellation & IPX4 Water-Resistance
